summary: DOD revamped its acquisition policies in 2020 to try to deliver innovative weapons faster. These weapons are often "cyber-physical" products that combine hardware and software. We previously found that leading companies use iterative design, testing, and feedback processes to get these kinds of products to market quickly. But some program managers weren't sure how to apply iterative development in their programs. So we recommended the...
title: DOD Acquisition Reform: Military Departments Should Take Steps to Facilitate Speed and Innovation
